amendment.description: To authorize the United States Air Force Institute of Technology to receive faulty research grants for scientific, literary, and educational purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1356 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1356 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator DeWine. (consideration: CR S12497-12513; text: CR S12498) To authorize the United States Air Force Institute of Technology to receive faulty research grants for scientific, literary, and educational purposes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1356 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1356 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator DeWine.
